actionConfiguration.body:
Select `CUSTOMER_OID`,
`CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_TYPE`,
`CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_LINE1`,
`CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_LINE2`,
`CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_CITY`,
`CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_DISTRICT`,
`CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_ZIP`,
`CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_STATE`,
`CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_COUNTRY`,
`CUSTOMER_REG_PHONE_NO`,
`CUSTOMER_REG_PHONE_EXTEN`,
`CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE1`,
`CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE2`,
`CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_CITY`,
`CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_DISTRICT`,
`CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_ZIP`,
`CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_STATE`,
`CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_COUNTRY`,
`CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_NO`,
`CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_EXTEN` from APS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_PERSON_DETAILS  where `CUSTOMER_OID` ='{{appsmith.store.customerOID}}' AND( `CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_TYPE`='E_ADDRESSTYPE_BOTH' OR `CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_TYPE`='E_ADDRESSTYPE_COMMUNICATION') ;
